course_details: C Programming is a versatile, procedural language known for its efficiency, used for software development.
Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems, fundamental in computer science and various applications.
C++ is a powerful programming language used in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) for efficient problem-solving.
Basic data structures include arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, crucial for organizing and manipulating data.
Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python focuses on creating reusable, modular code using classes and objects.
Software engineering is a systematic, disciplined approach to designing, developing, and maintaining software systems efficiently and reliably.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform, offering scalable and cost-effective infrastructure and services.
MySQL is an open-source relational database management system, widely used for data storage and retrieval in applications.
Problem-solving involves identifying, analyzing, and finding solutions to challenges or issues using critical thinking and creativity.
